title: Introduction to Photography
description: Learn the basics of photography, including camera settings and composition.

title: Understanding Exposure
description: Explore the concepts of aperture, shutter speed, and ISO.

description: An introduction to JavaScript programming for beginners.

description: Learn how to create and use functions in JavaScript.

description: Learn how to write basic SQL queries.

description: Master joins, subqueries, and performance tuning in SQL.

description: Learn to create RESTful APIs using Express.js.
